name: Just keep swimming (thamara)
description:
In this endless runner you control Cardyfish, a determined fish willing to swim across the dangerous river, dodging fishers and rocks. But Cardyfish is a hungry hungry being, so keep her fed, so she can go far.

Control

A/D or W/S or Left/Right arrows to move

Space to revert (go against the stream)

Esc to pause/settings

Credits

Art and development with <3 by Thamara Andrade using Godot Engine.

Stream sounds by kurt.
